author: stoddard
msg: apr_stat() in http_request.c only needs size, type, mtime, ctime & atime values from
the file. Modify apr_stat() under windows to accomodate apr_stat( APR_FINFO_MIN)

author: trawick
msg: Fix the export list builder to understand more preprocessor constructs

author: trawick
msg: get rid of the bzero() macro which we spit out on platforms
where we didn't think bzero() was implemented;
it turns out that on SVR4 it is implemented but we spit out
the macro anyway and clashed with a system header file
As APR doesn't need to guarantee the existence of bzero(),

author: dreid
msg: Get this working on beos again so we can serve pages!
Some of the code improvements were suggested by Carlos Hasan
